data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Sometimes, spyware is included along with genuine software, and may come from a malicious website or may have been added to the intentional functionality of genuine software (see the paragraph about Facebook, below). In ____ to ____ emergence ____ spyware, a ____ industry ____ sprung ____ dealing ____ anti-spyware ____. Running anti-spyware software ____ become a widely ____ element ____ computer ____ practices, especially ____ computers ____ Microsoft Windows. A number of jurisdictions have passed anti-spyware laws, which usually target any software that is surreptitiously installed to control a user's computer.
data.partBlankContent: Sometimes, spyware is included along with genuine software, and may come from a malicious website or may have been added to the intentional functionality of genuine software (see the paragraph about Facebook, below). In resp____ to t__ emergence o_ spyware, a sm___ industry h__ sprung u_ dealing i_ anti-spyware soft____. Running anti-spyware software h__ become a widely recog_____ element o_ computer secu____ practices, especially f__ computers run____ Microsoft Windows. A number of jurisdictions have passed anti-spyware laws, which usually target any software that is surreptitiously installed to control a user's computer.
data.answer: 有时，间谍软件是包含在正版软件里的，可能来自一个恶意网站，也可能被添加到正版软件的意向功能中(见下面关于Facebook的段落)。为了应对间谍软件的出现，反间谍软件的小型产业如雨后春笋般涌现。运行反间谍软件已经成为被广泛认可的计算机安全措施，特别是对于运行微软Windows的计算机。一些司法管辖区已经通过了反间谍软件法，通常针对的是偷偷安装来控制用户电脑的软件。
